A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was sooo excited to go see this.  Then I just sat there with my arms crossed\, frustrated by what I was watching.  This had hints of being really great.  If an 30-45 minutes of edits had been done with would have been an exciting drama\, adventure\, fable to keep the Star Wars themes moving along.  I enjoyed the back and forth between Rey and Ben.  Even cranky Luke was fun.  But these characters were let down but stupid sub-plots and other characters being turned into boring jerks or completely irrelevant.   This film lacked focus and was so frustrating.  I do love Rey and want to see her story evolve.  She and Ben were the only saving moments for me.
